module.name: org.langhua.opencms.portlet
module.description:
You can use this module to export a portlet war and deploy it in a portal such as JBoss Portal. I recommend you using OpenCms as the production system of portlet content. To do this, just set something like this in portlet-instances.xml: 
            
               url
               http://localhost:8081/opencms/opencms/myportlet/
